original_text: The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit. The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit. The people who remain in Judah will be like strong plants that put their roots down into the ground. Their branches will give lots of fruit.
korean_text: 유다 족속 중에서 피하고 남은 자는 다시 아래로 뿌리를 내리고 위로 열매를 맺을지라

sentences.original_text: The people who remain in Judah
that put their roots down into the ground
Their branches will give lots of fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 가지는 많은 열매를 맺을 것입니다
